sql: SELECT SUM(Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan) AS Total_Domestic_Tourism_Revenue_2020 FROM tours JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND year = 2020
SELECT international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar FROM tours JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province = '湖北省' AND year = 2020
SELECT star_hotel_number FROM tours WHERE city = '湖北省' AND year = 2010
SELECT cities.name, COUNT(airports.IATA) AS airport_count FROM cities JOIN airports ON Intersects(cities.Shape, airports.Location) GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT c.name FROM cities c LEFT JOIN airports a ON Intersects(c.Shape, a.Location) WHERE a.IATA IS NULL

SELECT cities.name AS City, COUNT(scenicSpots.name) AS NumberOf5AScenicSpots FROM cities JOIN scenicSpots ON Contains(cities.Shape, scenicSpots.Location) WHERE scenicSpots.level = '5A' GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT G.province, SUM(Area(c.Shape, 1)) AS Total_Province_Area FROM 'cities' AS c JOIN 'GDPs' AS G ON c.province = G.province GROUP BY G.province
SELECT GDPs.province, SUM(Area(cities.Shape, 1)) AS total_area FROM cities JOIN GDPs ON cities.province = GDPs.province GROUP BY GDPs.province ORDER BY total_area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT province FROM cities WHERE MBRMinX(Shape) = (SELECT MIN(MBRMinX(Shape)) FROM cities)
SELECT province FROM cities WHERE MBRMinY(Shape) = (SELECT MIN(MBRMinY(Shape)) FROM cities)
SELECT name FROM cities WHERE province = '河南省' ORDER BY Y(Centroid(Shape)) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scenicSpots WHERE level IN ('3A', '4A', '5A') AND Distance(Location, (SELECT Location FROM stations WHERE name = '六安'), 1) <= 10000
SELECT s.name, Distance(st.Location, s.Location, 1) AS distance_in_meters FROM scenicSpots s, stations st WHERE st.name = '岳阳东' AND s.level = '5A' AND Distance(st.Location, s.Location, 1) <= 100000

SELECT -- First, find the province with the highest GDP in 2023 WITH HighestGDPProvince AS ( SELECT province FROM GDPs ORDER BY year_2023 DESC LIMIT 1 ) -- Then, count the number of airports in that province SELECT p.province, COUNT(a.IATA) AS NumberOfAirports FROM HighestGDPProvince p JOIN cities c ON p.province = c.province JOIN airports a ON Contains(c.Shape, a.Location) GROUP BY p.province
SELECT province FROM GDPs ORDER BY year_2023 DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT city FROM tours WHERE year BETWEEN 2011 AND 2020 ORDER BY international_tourists_number_Wan DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM airports WHERE Location IN (SELECT Shape FROM cities WHERE name = '哈尔滨市')
SELECT a.Name FROM airports a, cities c WHERE c.name = '北京市' AND Intersects(c.Shape, a.Location)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scenicSpots WHERE level >= '3A' AND address LIKE '%新疆维吾尔自治区%'
SELECT Area(Union(Shape), 1) AS Area_in_meters FROM cities WHERE province = '西藏自治区'

SELECT SUM(international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar) AS Total_International_Tourism_Earnings_2020 FROM tours JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS Total_Area FROM cities WHERE province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省')
SELECT province, MAX(Area(Shape, 1)) AS max_area FROM cities WHERE province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') GROUP BY province ORDER BY max_area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Serviced_Cities FROM cities WHERE Distance( (SELECT Location FROM airports WHERE Name = '大理'), cities.Shape, 1 ) <= 150000

SELECT s.name, MAX(Distance(c.Shape, s.Location, 1)) AS max_distance FROM scenicSpots s, cities c WHERE s.level = '5A' AND c.name = '北京市' AND s.address LIKE '%北京%' GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY max_distance DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Distance( (SELECT Location FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '北海公园'), (SELECT Location FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '恭王府'), 1 ) AS Distance_in_meters
SELECT name, Distance(Location, (SELECT Location FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '八大处公园'), 1) AS distance FROM scenicSpots WHERE level = '5A' AND name != '八大处公园' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1
SELECT c.name FROM cities c, airports a WHERE a.Name = '阿克苏/温宿' AND Contains(c.Shape, a.Location)
SELECT address FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '天台山景区'

SELECT t.city, COUNT(ss.name) AS NumberOf5A_ScenicSpots FROM tours t JOIN cities c ON t.city = c.name LEFT JOIN scenicSpots ss ON ss.level = '5A' AND Contains(c.Shape, ss.Location) WHERE t.year = 2020 GROUP BY t.city ORDER BY t.international_tourists_number_Wan DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT c.province, t.Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan FROM cities c JOIN tours t ON c.name = t.city WHERE c.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND t.year = 2020

SELECT GDPs.province, SUM(Area(cities.Shape, 1)) AS total_area FROM GDPs JOIN cities ON GDPs.province = cities.province WHERE GDPs.year_2023 > (SELECT year_2023 FROM GDPs WHERE province = '浙江省') GROUP BY GDPs.province
SELECT city, star_hotel_number FROM tours WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY star_hotel_number DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT distance FROM buslines WHERE name = '874路'
SELECT name, MAX(distance) AS longest_distance FROM buslines
SELECT b.name, b.start_stop, b.end_stop, b.distance FROM buslines b ORDER BY b.distance DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Name, SUM(length) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(length) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS TotalGreenSpaceArea FROM greenspaces
SELECT NAME, SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS Total_Area FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME
SELECT NAME, SUM(Shape_Area) AS Total_Area FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME ORDER BY Total_Area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS TotalArea FROM greenspaces WHERE NAME = '玄武湖公园'
SELECT d.name AS DistrictName, SUM(Area(Intersection(g.Shape, d.Shape), 1)) AS GreenSpaceArea FROM districts d JOIN greenspaces g ON Intersects(g.Shape, d.Shape) GROUP BY d.name

SELECT d.name AS District, SUM(Area(Intersection(g.Shape, d.Shape), 1)) AS TotalGreenSpaceArea FROM districts d JOIN greenspaces g ON Intersects(g.Shape, d.Shape) GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY TotalGreenSpaceArea DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Line, COUNT(station) AS NumberOfStations FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line
SELECT Line, COUNT(station) AS NumberOfStations FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line
SELECT lineID, name FROM buslines WHERE start_time = '0500'
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(b.Location, h.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels h, busstops b WHERE b.name = '三元巷' ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 5
SELECT Line, COUNT(station) AS NumberOfStations FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line ORDER BY NumberOfStations DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT s.Line, COUNT(DISTINCT d.name) AS Districts_Crossed FROM subways s JOIN subwaystations ss ON s.Line = ss.Line JOIN districts d ON Intersects(ss.Location, d.Shape) GROUP BY s.Line
SELECT GLength(Shape, 1) AS LengthInMeters FROM subways WHERE Line = 'line4'
SELECT DISTINCT s2.Line FROM subways s1 JOIN subways s2 ON s1.Line != s2.Line WHERE s1.Line = 'line10二期' AND Intersects(s1.Shape, s2.Shape)
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalSubwayLength FROM subways

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance_meters FROM agencies, subwaystations WHERE agencies.NAME = '南京市文物局' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance_meters ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(s.Location, h.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels h, subwaystations s WHERE s.station = '鼓楼' AND s.Line = 'line4' AND Distance(s.Location, h.Location, 1) <= 1000

SELECT subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations JOIN buslines AS bus874 ON bus874.name = '874路' JOIN buslines AS bus711 ON bus711.name = '711路' WHERE Intersects(bus874.Shape, bus711.Shape) ORDER BY Distance( Centroid(Intersection(bus874.Shape, bus711.Shape)), subwaystations.Location ) ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(intersection_point, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance_meters FROM ( SELECT Intersection(r1.Shape, r2.Shape) AS intersection_point FROM roads AS r1, roads AS r2 WHERE r1.Name = '秦淮路' AND r2.Name = '将军大道' ) AS intersection CROSS JOIN subwaystations ORDER BY distance_meters LIMIT 1
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS Total_Length FROM rails GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM rails GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalRailwayLength FROM rails
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(agencies.NAME) AS agency_count FROM districts JOIN agencies ON Within(agencies.Location, districts.Shape) GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY agency_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT d.name FROM districts d JOIN subwaystations ss ON d.administrative_division_code = ss.adcode WHERE ss.station = '大行宫'
SELECT d.name FROM districts d, agencies a WHERE Contains(d.Shape, a.Location) AND a.NAME = '江苏省海事局'
SELECT name, MAX(Area(Shape, 1)) AS MaxArea FROM districts
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) AS Area_in_meters FROM districts
SELECT d.name AS District, COUNT(DISTINCT s.Line) AS NumberOfSubwayLines FROM districts d JOIN subwaystations ss ON Contains(d.Shape, ss.Location) JOIN subways s ON ss.Line = s.Line GROUP BY d.name
SELECT h.NAME FROM hotels h, roads r WHERE r.Name = '广州路' AND Distance(h.Location, r.Shape, 1) <= 1000

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM subwaystations JOIN agencies ON agencies.NAME = '南京市房产局' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.Line) AS NumberOfSubwayLines FROM subways s JOIN districts d ON Intersects(s.Shape, d.Shape) WHERE d.name = '玄武区'
SELECT B.name FROM buslines B JOIN busstops BS ON B.start_stop = BS.name JOIN districts D ON Contains(D.Shape, BS.Location) WHERE D.name = '六合区' AND B.start_time = '0500'
SELECT d.name AS District, b.name AS BusLine FROM districts d JOIN buslines b ON Intersects(d.Shape, b.Shape) WHERE b.start_time < '0500'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(buslines.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM subwaystations JOIN subways ON subwaystations.Line = subways.Line JOIN buslines ON buslines.name = '709路' WHERE Distance(buslines.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1) IS NOT NULL GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(a.Location, h.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM agencies a, hotels h WHERE a.NAME = '南京市文物局' AND Distance(a.Location, h.Location, 1) <= 500 ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT buslines.name FROM buslines, roads WHERE roads.Name = '建康路' AND Intersects(buslines.Shape, roads.Shape)
SELECT d.name, COUNT(a.NAME) AS num_agencies FROM districts d JOIN agencies a ON Within(a.Location, d.Shape) GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY num_agencies DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT h.NAME, MIN(Distance(h.Location, ss.Location, 1)) AS Distance FROM hotels h, subwaystations ss, districts d WHERE ss.station = '南京南站' AND d.name = '江宁区' AND Within(h.Location, d.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY h.NAME ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 1
SELECT d.name AS DistrictName, SUM(GLength(Intersection(s.Shape, d.Shape), 1)) AS SubwayLengthInDistrict FROM districts d JOIN subways s ON Intersects(s.Shape, d.Shape) GROUP BY d.name

SELECT d.name AS District, SUM(GLength(Intersection(s.Shape, d.Shape), 1)) AS TotalSubwayLength FROM districts d JOIN subways s ON Intersects(s.Shape, d.Shape) GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY TotalSubwayLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways JOIN subwaystations ON subways.Line = subwaystations.Line JOIN districts ON Intersects(districts.Shape, subwaystations.Location) WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'
SELECT DISTINCT d.name FROM districts d, rails r WHERE Intersects(d.Shape, r.Shape)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalHotelsInXuanwu FROM hotels WHERE Contains( (SELECT Shape FROM districts WHERE name = '玄武区'), Location )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfHotels FROM hotels h, subways s WHERE s.Line = 'S7' AND Distance(h.Location, s.Shape, 1) <= 500
SELECT d.name FROM districts d JOIN greenspaces g ON Intersects(d.Shape, g.Shape) WHERE g.NAME = '钟山风景区'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(greenspaces.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM greenspaces, subwaystations WHERE greenspaces.NAME = '郑和公园' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT G.NAME FROM greenspaces G, subwaystations S WHERE S.station = '上海路' AND G.NAME LIKE '%公园%' ORDER BY Distance(S.Location, G.Shape, 1) LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS YangtzeRiverArea FROM rivers WHERE Name = '长江'
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways, rivers WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND Intersects(subways.Shape, rivers.Shape)
SELECT DISTINCT districts.name FROM districts, rivers WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape)
SELECT d.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(d.Shape, r.Shape), 1)) AS YangtzeRiverArea FROM districts d, rivers r WHERE r.Name = '长江' AND Intersects(d.Shape, r.Shape) GROUP BY d.name
SELECT subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations, rivers WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND Distance(subwaystations.Location, rivers.Shape, 1) <= 1000
SELECT DISTINCT buslines.name FROM buslines, rivers WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND Intersects(buslines.Shape, rivers.Shape)
SELECT hotels.NAME FROM hotels, rivers WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' ORDER BY Distance(hotels.Location, rivers.Shape, 1) LIMIT 1
SELECT h.NAME, MIN(Distance(a.Location, h.Location, 1)) AS Distance FROM agencies a, hotels h WHERE a.NAME = '高淳县教育局委员会' GROUP BY h.NAME ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 1
SELECT G.NAME, MIN(Distance(S.Shape, G.Shape, 1)) AS Distance FROM greenspaces G, subways S WHERE S.Line = 'line1' AND G.NAME LIKE '%公园%' GROUP BY G.NAME ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 1
SELECT d.name AS District, COUNT(ss.station) AS SubwayStations FROM districts d LEFT JOIN subwaystations ss ON d.administrative_division_code = ss.adcode GROUP BY d.name
SELECT d.name, COUNT(*) AS station_count FROM districts d JOIN subwaystations s ON d.administrative_division_code = s.adcode GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY station_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Line, MAX(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS MaxLength FROM subways
SELECT r.Name FROM roads r, roads dongfeng WHERE dongfeng.Name = '东风路' AND Intersects(r.Shape, dongfeng.Shape) AND r.Name != '东风路'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(hotels.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM subwaystations, hotels WHERE hotels.NAME = '金龙大酒店' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) AS area_meters FROM districts WHERE name IN ('玄武区', '秦淮区')
